aka: Berlin 1936: Dans les coulisses des Jeux Olympiques
The Olympic Dream: The 1936 Nazi Games

director.name: 弗洛里安·胡贝尔 Florian Huber

this_title: Der Traum von Olympia - Die Nazi-Spiele von 1936
trans_title: 1936年纳粹运动会奥林匹亚之梦
Berlin 1936: Dans les coulisses des Jeux Olympiques
The Olympic Dream: The 1936 Nazi Games
introduction: The 1936 Berlin Olympics changed the world. Never before had the games been this elaborate—or this controversial. The world's biggest sporting event was turned into a Nazi propaganda fest. This docu-drama tells the stories of the people who shaped and participated in those games.
chinese_title: 1936年纳粹运动会奥林匹亚之梦
foreign_title: Der Traum von Olympia - Die Nazi-Spiele von 1936
